title: (5370-408) Mirandela - N15
description: Free parking for city tours and ancient bridge.

title: (5370-285) Mirandela -
description: Parque Verde da city with many activities and a lot of space next to the Padaria river, gasoline pumps and public toilets (dated at night), soccer field, tênis and river praia

title: (5370-201) Mirandela - 231 Alameda Rio Tua
description: Parking next to the Tua river. Quiet place with shade of trees.

title: (5370) Mirandela -
description: Large unserviced car park next to the campsite, beautiful view among the olive trees. Bicycle path and hiking trail. Ideal for spending a quiet night.

name: 3 Rios Maravilha
title: () 3 Rios Maravilha
description: Campsite with camper van reception. Giant swimming pool in the campsite (provide supplement for the swimming pool) very pleasant during the hot summer months. On the other hand, isolated from the city.

title: (5370) Rio Torto - N213
description: Nice surprise this morning when this place was revealed to us on waking. We fell there by chance in the middle of the night at the end of a path without seeing where we really were ... Riverside, calm with a disused mill. Very nice site.

title: (5370) Frechas - 18 Rua dos Barriais
description: Lawn on the river with parking for cars or RV. BBQ area and swimming-pool facilities. Small cafe on the water. Overnight probably not allowed but no exact info

title: (5370-135) Frechas - 118 Rua do Fundo do Povo
title_short: (5370-135) Frechas - 118 Rua do Fundo do Povo
description: Nice and quiet spot close to the river for swimming. In the evening friendly locals strol to the cafe near the bridge.

title: (5370) -
description: Beatiful climbing and take-off site for paragliders, near which it should be possible to stay the night, under the pines (no prohibitions mentioned). Superb panoramic view, however a little spoiled by the electricity poles. I still recommend it in the middle of summer because it faces the south! And watch out for the access road (4-5 km from the village of Passos) which is an unpaved forest track, lots of stones so not for low cars.

title: (5370) - 39 Rua Gricha
description: Quiet place, good place surrounded by nature. near a small village and nice people. Staying overnight is better when you talk to the chef of the bar (Bar do Miguel). We were here today, but have no way of driving to the place because our camper with a trailer is too big... We were right in front of the bridge to the site

title: (5370) Franco - 11 Largo Franco
description: The tap in the public square is available to travelers. You have enough space to park large vehicles. We have seen semi-trailers pull up in this lovely town for food. You have a restaurant but also a cafe available. The COSTA café is run by a charming couple who speak French and will offer you a pleasant moment of discovery of Portuguese culture. Possibility to buy homemade olive oil, port, honey, and grape jam. And depending on the season of the sausages. Stop doing without hesitation! :)

title: (5430) Valpaços - Unnamed Road
description: For lunch break or more, no prohibition sign, beautiful view, too bad, not very clean

title: (5430) - R206
description: Picnic area overlooking a busy road during the day. We stayed for the night. No noise.

title: () Valpaços - 17 Rua 13 do Bairro 1º de Maio
title_short: () Valpaços - 17 Rua 13 do Bairro 1º de Maio
description: Lots of room next to a gymnasium, calm and friendly during my visit, I did not test at night but it seems possible because no interdict, nearby Intermarché, no service.

title: (5430) Valpaços - 12 Rua C do Bairro da Crasta
title_short: (5430) Valpaços - 12 Rua C do Bairro da Crasta
description: Residential area near the exposition center of Valpaços. Near Supermarket Pingo Doce.

address.street: 12 Rua C do Bairro da Crasta

title: (5430-424) Valpaços -
description: Service area on Intermarché car park, gray water drainage, black water. Filling clean water. Clean. Next to the city restaurant on small place Tasquinha do pinheiro good and Portuguese price.

name: Parque de campismo e caravanismo do Rabaçal
title: (5430) Parque de campismo e caravanismo do Rabaçal
title_short: (5430) Parque de campismo e caravanismo do Rabaçal
description: Pleasant riverside campsite surrounded by mountains, motorhome, caravan, tent with river view, beach with shower, large barbecue area with covered fireplace, bar and restaurant on site with river view, clean sanitary facilities and in good condition with disabled access, chalet rental, town of Valpaços 8 km away.

title: (5430) Valpaços - Unnamed Road
description: Flat, with a little shade in the center of town. Calm and peaceful. ASA for AC at 300 meters.

title: (5385) - EM206-1
description: Parking of the small chapel. Entry by the small dirt road. Several grassy places but expect wedges or flat concrete platform. Water behind the chapel. In trouble because nothing exceptional but close to the city about 1.5 km with all shops.

title: (5340) Macedo de Cavaleiros - N15
description: cepsa station with LPG

title: (5340) Macedo de Cavaleiros - N216
description: Small Atlantic petrol station. Free water service. There is a small sign which indicates that the store must be warned before serving.

title: (5385) Torre de Dona Chama - 98 Rua São Brás
title_short: (5385) Torre de Dona Chama - 98 Rua São Brás
description: Place in front of the chapel Castro Sao Brãs. Grand view at almost 180 degrees. Access only small van (max 6m) or 4x4 motorhome.

title: (5340-310) Macedo de Cavaleiros - 6 Rua das Piscinas
title_short: (5340-310) Macedo de Cavaleiros - 6 Rua das Piscinas
description: In the Center of the village square next to all amenities. Quiet and secure place. Service area in the swimming pool car park with a Euro-relay terminal.

title: (5360-303) Vila Flor - 57 Avenida Marechal Carmona
description: Parking in front of the court but very quiet. full center. in height so pretty clear view and appreciable wind in summer. bars, restaurant, bakery, playground, public toilets nearby. at the edge of the road but frankly it's worth it to visit this small town. we stayed 1 night with a big truck without problem. the police saw us, no worries.

title: (5360-396) Vila Flor - 6 Rua Doutor Monteiro
description: Car park located under the exhibition center on the terrace, a restaurant bar 100m away and a food truck permanently on the lowest terrace, beautiful view of some dog barking in the distance at night, flat and paved car park about 100 places but deserted if not exhibition, 2 steps from the city, recommended by the mayor and the police, accessible to all vehicles, even the longest

title: (5445) -
description: Parking lot of '' Altar de sacrifícios, '' in Argeriz. large lot on flat grass or almost with large trees and picnic tables and bins and another open area ... all with a beautiful view of the valley

title: (5430) - Unnamed Road
description: Visited site May 2022. A slightly odd and eerie place. Satnav took us up a very steep unmade road. At the top we found a disused and vandalised toilet block, some very old children’s play equipment and a view. No water. We didn’t stay. We left by a made up road, poor condition, past the old church which, if we had found first, we might have stayed but earlier experience put us off.

title: (5360) Vila Flor -
description: Swimming pool parking, outside the Camping, which is closed for now! It has a fountain with a tap, a little further up, next to the playground, 50 meters away.

name: Camping Village Flower Park
title: (5360) Camping Village Flower Park
description: Parque Campismo Vila Flor Barragem Do Peneireiro Beautiful campsite with swimming pool located next to the dam

title: (5360) Vila Flor - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet parking around a lake. It is forbidden to bathe there and also for dogs. Good for a short walk around the lake. Small town close by.

title: (5445) Carrezedo de Montenegro - 28 R206
description: Picnic area in a new activity zone. 5 tables, games for children, city stadium, possible to spend the night, slightly sloping. For the moment lacks shade.

title: (5430) Barreiros - R. Principal
description: Spacious parking area with a few trees for shade. 2 kilometers away climb (via ferrata) and swimming possibility. Due to the large truck, I do not go on the sandy path to the river, possibly for a small camper place on the river. Toilet block and bar closed on my visit

title: (5340) - Azibo
description: Small place under some oaks in front of the leisure center. A beach of rock and gravel offers crystal clear and warm water. The absolute calm of this place is worth seeing. Be careful the paths are multiple but some are completely impassable. It's up to you to know how to use the satellite mode of the GPS to make your way. We did it with an 8m PL. To envisage holds is on slope. The place is dirty (fishing place ...)

title: (5340-392) Podence - Quinta do Pomar
description: Private free park

title: (5090) Murça - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful lookout of Murça village. No worries to stay overnight.

title: (5090) Murça - Unnamed Road
description: Spacious asphalt parking lot on top of the hill. A little bit uneven.

title: (5340) Macedo de Cavaleiros - N15
description: At the entrance of Podence, perfect for visiting the village and spending the night.

title: (5090) - R314
description: Picnic area with barbecue and water. No problem to stay over night.

title: () Murça - Variante à N15
description: On the parking of the municipal stadium of Murca. Very warm welcome by the caretaker who allowed us to spend the night. Near the city, even if it has little interest. Now upgraded with free fresh water, sewage for grey and dark waters.

title: (5350-022) Alfândega da Fé - R1 de Maio
title_short: (5350-022) Alfândega da Fé - R1 de Maio

description: Water fountain in town with easy parking access to fill your drinking water.

title: (5340) Macedo de Cavaleiros - Unnamed Road
description: Magnificent bathing place with beach bars and water games for children, the only drawback is that they do not allow overnight stays.

title: (5340) - Azibo
description: Peninsula next to the dam. Clear and warm water.

title: (5340) Azibo - Azibo
description: Quiet, hot water for swimming in August of course ...

title: (5340) - Azibo
description: In the shelter of a large oak Cork, bordering the lake, accessible by a path around the lake, recommended 4x4 but many classic cars have been seen so feasible for 2x4.

name: Azibo Reservoir Protected Landscape
title: (5340-400) Azibo Reservoir Protected Landscape
description: Superb spot, calm with beautiful 180° view. Free but little space and parking a little sloping. Overnight stays and camping prohibited!

address.street: Cabeço do Fidalgo, Percurso EBIO de Santa Combinha

title: (5340) Macedo de Cavaleiros -
description: A small place for a small vehicle (4x4 or van). Place with an unbeatable view, presence of fauna on the shore.

title: (5340) Macedo de Cavaleiros - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet park, with good access to hiking, sport fishing and bouldering areas. In the less frequented area of ​​the Azibo dam, but far from the river beach and its parking restrictions.

title: (5340) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking near the lake very quiet place. Beware of mosquitoes at night. Very narrow road from the village, big motorhomes won't be able to cross only vans.

title: (5340-410) Rau da Capela - 62 Rua Eira da Portela
title_short: (5340-410) Rau da Capela - 62 Rua Eira da Portela
description: Clean drinking water. The faucet has a lot of pressure. In 3 minutes we had filled up 100l. The lake here is also super beautiful

title: (5385) - 14 Largo Aguieira
description: An exceptional natural place near a chapel. A breathtaking view! And absolute calm. The little old man who maintains the chapel was very friendly and even offered to supply us with water. The last hectometres are on a stony path but passable by most vehicles. Big favorite!

title: (5140) -
description: Place flat with a pontoon for swimming, very beautiful view in peace. Great hike nearby .. (Trilho de Sao lourenço)

title: (5430) - N103
description: Place really very quiet in the middle of the village. Nice view.

title: (5445) Padrela e Tazém - 6 Rua Er 206
description: Simple, practically level parking lot located by the roadside illuminated at night with some shade. 2 picnic tables. Large enough to accept several large motorhomes. A fountain with a tap and standard screw allows filling with water. No emptying service.

title: (5450) Tresminas - Unnamed Road
description: Good quiet area to spend the night and as a starting point to visit the Roman mines, walks in the mountains near a climbing area in Vilarelho.

title: (5070) Vila Chã - N212
description: Quiet place for a night surrounded by nature. Easy to reach. A sports field and a cemetery are nearby.

title: (5140) Carrazeda de Ansiães - CM1141
description: Large shaded picnic area with barbecue, fitness trail, no sign prohibition camping car No services Not far from the pool

title: (5430) Lebução - 13 Estrada Nacional
description: Small car park just off the N103. Several picnic tables, water, garbage. Only suitable for a short stopover.

title: (5160) Torre de Moncorvo - N102
description: Parking in Torre de Moncorvo

title: (5430-047) Vilartao - Rua Bandeira
description: Exceptional welcome, extraordinary human qualities. Upon our arrival Xavier and Fatima immediately set a family tone and will pamper you throughout your stay. Do not hesitate to enjoy the exceptional brioche bread and tasty local cuisine finely cooked by Fatima.

title: (5400-658) Oucidres -
description: Beautiful mountain view in a small Portuguese village quiet place without disturbance pleasant to live.

title: (5335) - N103
description: Road N103, 61km West Bragenza, nice, flat, top hill, short unpaved road, place with 360° free view, very quiet.

title: (5350) Miradouro da Cabreira - Unnamed Road
description: Small corner for 1 motorhome, along a small panoramic road starting from Picoes towards Cabrera .. Magnificent view of the 'Lagos do Sabror' .. Let's preserve this incomparable place .. Attention ⚠ road not recommended for large motorhomes!

title: (5070) Alijó - Unnamed Road
description: Resting place, quiet. Good solar exposure. Nice landscape. Near da Vila de Alijó.

title: (5160) Cilhade - Unnamed road
description: Parking at a dam. No amenities, but perfect for an overnight stay. Along a very busy road, one or two cars per hour during rush hour. We thought it was delicious.

title: (5070) - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful site on the lake (water reservoir), some pines to make shade, clear water and sandy beach; difficult access, motorhomes not recommended.

title: (5070) - Unnamed Road
description:
Nice viewpoint on the top of a village! The access is a very inclined road but short distance. Either you can park next to the chapel where there is a small flat area or a bit before on the left, a area with more space and more flat. Good running water inside the area of the chapel and a small "cave" next to it.
I didn't stayed over night but for sure no problem!

title: (5200) Mogadouro - N216
description: Close to the N216 bridge, below on a road that has been flooded. Quiet area for swimming. We did not sleep there but no ban.

title: () Remondes - N216
description: Very quiet night. Very isolated place along the Rio Sabor. Road that was submerged after the construction of the new bridge. Just after the bridge coming from Pinhero but the same exists on the other side. Very quiet place, nice view. Very little passage on the bridge. Some fishermen in the morning. Place to keep clean. Win waste and toilet paper please. Suitable for small vans (narrow road to turn around)

title: (5200) Santo André -
description: Small parking space at driveway. Access via gravel road. Magnificent view of dam. No traffic, good for one night. Leave no trash!

title: (5400) Oucidres - Unnamed Road
description: Water and toilets were closed on May 11, 2023. Not accessible by cc rather by 4x4 and small fitted van, the view from the ruins of the castle is magnificent and the granite tables are protected by roofs, everything is new there. finished in October 2021, stone BBQ.

title: (5160) - Unnamed Road
description:
Beautiful and calm spot near a chapel. The place was recently restored with a swings that serves like a viewpoint.
There are public toilets, but unfortunately were closed.
Possible to sleep if you can.

title: (5400) Tronco - Estrada Nacional
description: Small bus stop by the road with a stone table under the trees. Room for two or three vehicles in a row.

title: (5160) Torre de Moncorvo -
description: Douro Aqua Fun. Nice and calm water park to go with the kids during the day.

title: (5160) - Unnamed Rd
description: Free water fountain.

title: (5200) Meirinhos -
description: Gravel road access, beautiful place by the water to spend the night far from everyone.

title: (5160) - 59 Largo da Lameira
description: Nice typical village. Large square with a fountain. All sizes of motorhome.

title: (5200) Meirinhos -
description: On an easily accessible stony track, a median in a bend for one to 2 vans. No passage all night, very nice view of the artificial lake.

title: () - E802
description: Quiet corner at the edge of the Douro possibility of water, toilet, small restaurant where you eat cheap fish fry caught in the Douro, not easy to find but it deserves! Foz Do Sabor Village

title: (5160) - N102
description: Comfortable rest area with flat parking, picnic tables and even sinks and WC barbecue area => ideal for one night.

title: (5070) São Mamede de Ribatua - Unnamed Road
title_short: (5070) São Mamede de Ribatua - Unnamed Road
description: Great place to stay day and night, kids can play with the clean water.

title: (5400-632) Faiões - 42 Estrada Nacional
description: Large parking located next to a church (the bell does not ring the day). This parking will only allow you to park, but to spend the night quietly.

title: (5070) Sanfins do Douro - Rua do Cruzeiro
title_short: (5070) Sanfins do Douro - Rua do Cruzeiro
description: Great location for the night on the large parking lot. Chapel of Miradouro Senhora Da Piedade with a 360 ° view, bar open during the day, barbecue available as well as water taps for motorhomes, better to go through Alijo then continue north by the national then follow the signs the other type van can pass by the borough of Sanfin Do Douro

name: Camping Quinta do Rebentão
title: (5400-756) Camping Quinta do Rebentão
description: Quinta do Rebentão campsite. Very nice and cheap, restaurant and baker who leaves every morning at 9am.

title: (5070) Sanfins do Douro - Rua do Cruzeiro
title_short: (5070) Sanfins do Douro - Rua do Cruzeiro
description: Magnificent viewpoint at the foot of a castle. No service but really quiet.

title: (5450) - 12 Avenida Lopes Oliveira
description: Quiet place to spend the night, without services, next to the Centro de Saúde. Not recommended for vehicles over 7 meters. It is worth to visit the thermal park and the gardens of seus.

title: (5160) - N102
description: At the edge of the Douro, 2 boats at the dock, in front of the beach, quiet and shaded area for a van or 2. no services but shower and toilet on the beach 5 min.

title: (5450) Mesão Frio - 13 EM549
description: Parking place in Pedras Salgadas. Close to a road but quiet at night. Next to tables and water. Also nice to visit the urban park, spa and drink natural sparkling water from a spring fountain. Equestrian center near by.

title: (5160) Torre de Moncorvo -
description: Gpl (lpg) bottle fill station

title: (5400-323) Chaves - 6 Rua Caneiro
description:
Outside self service laundry in E Leclerc carpark. Cash ONLY.
Washing machine.
Dryer.

title: () Torre de Moncorvo - N220
description: Torre de Moncorvo. True free motorhome area. A little away from the city. magnificent view. Drain - water - free. Toilets and softness free. Picnic tables available

title: (5300) - 6 EM1059
description: Ground and asphalt parking

title: (5400) Santo Estêvão - 9 Rua São Mateus Nº 1
title_short: (5400) Santo Estêvão - 9 Rua São Mateus Nº 1
description: In a square very close to the center, this place, accessible to all sizes, is stabilized and shaded. Passing vehicles, noisy. Around a small chapel at the "Largo S. Mateus" cafe, the area is pleasant, calm and relaxing with 2 water points. However, you must choose its location to be level. No dedicated motorhome service, but optimal satellite and 4G reception. Secure wifi network at the cafe with the code 8dm8723r

title: (5400-745) Santo António de Monforte -
description: Place to stop motorhomes near the nogueirinha reservoir easy access from here on foot to the water. Very quiet night and beautiful view over the city of Chaves.

title: () Chaves - Alameda Galinheira
description: Chaves car park, authorized from 8 a.m. to 10 p.m. to visit the city.

title: (5400-541) Chaves - 15 Alameda Trajano
description: Nice parking lot on the edge of the calm water come at the end of the evening to have space.

title: (5400-505) Chaves - Alameda de la Galinheira.
description: Free parking near the old town right on the river. There is a park right there for walking the dog.

title: (5070) Favaios - 3 Avenida Senhor Jesus Outeiro
description: Small village at the top of the douro. We discovered it on a motorcycle in 2016, and revisited this day by motorhome for its restaurant.

title: (5400-524) Chaves - 22 Alameda Trajano
description: Public parking next to the Tâmega river in a dead end street. Apparently calm. Unbeatable views. Near bar restaurant in the same parking

title: (5400-518) Chaves - GUEST HOUSE CHAVES, 46 Rua Solidão
title_short: (5400-518) Chaves - GUEST HOUSE CHAVES, 46 Rua Solidão
description: This space is located in the center of the large garden town of Chaves and in your environment has many sporting activities, a hiking and biking track. The Tâmega River is 20 meters and the center of the city is 200 meters.

title: (5400-524) Chaves - 7 Rua Tabolado
description: Laundromat - be careful on Sundays-

title: (5400-517) Chaves - 5 Alameda Tabolado
description: Free parking on the street. Next to nice park and restaurants.

title: (5400-355) Chaves - 26 Rua Longras
description: A large and very quiet car park. Very level. Near the town centre. The other parking places indicated here are no longer available. I had no problem here.

title: (5400) Chaves - Rua do Lazer
description: Small parking lot not far from the water and easy to access. A family spent the night there. we just day parking because the others were busy because of the Gallo Roman festival

title: (5400-017) Chaves - 10 Avenida 5 de Outubro
description:
Large car park, which allows you to visit the center and the Roman bridge by walking about 300m along the water.
Nothing prevents you from sleeping but very attractive

name: O Moinho
title: (5400) O Moinho
description: Near a river, in the parking lot of a restaurant where you do not have to go but you eat very well. Owners speak French and friendly. we can stay the time we want. We will come back.

title: (5200) - N216
description: Parking with view of the olive trees is the old road

title: (5400) Chaves - Avenida Doutor Mário Soares
description: Stayed on a Friday night. The car park was a combination of drag racing and rally car racing until 2am.    Possibly ok during the week.  We moved the following day!  The location is great with a short and pretty walk along the river to the old town.

title: (5425) Vidago - 21 Rua Faria de Morais
description: We parked here to visit Vidago, it's possible to park over night (no prohibited signs)

title: (5400-180) Chaves - 25 Rua do Sal
description: Public toilets, right on the side of the city hall.

title: (5160) Torre de Moncorvo - IP2
description: Nice parking spot next to a big lake with small mountains. Beautiful scenery! A bay next to the road. During day you hear cars, at night quiet. Great for a stop over rest.

title: (5400) Chaves - Largo Nossa Senhora da Lapa
title_short: (5400) Chaves - Largo Nossa Senhora da Lapa
description: Park not in the city center. Optimal performance of all.

title: (5400-563) Chaves -

title: (5300) Rebordãos - Unnamed Road

title: (5160) - Rua da Romanzeira
description: Beautiful quiet place on top of a hill next to a church with a view of Moncorvo. There are toilets for which you can ask the keys at the tourist office, and there are bbqs to use, with shelter and tables.

title: (5140) Castanheiro - Avenida da Estação
description: Large gravel place in Tua at the level crossing. We only parked, but there are no signs prohibiting overnight stays. Starting point for train journeys through the beautiful Douro Valley.

title: (5140) Tua - N212
description: A nice little corner on the banks of the Douro. Barbecue, garbage cans, games for children. The path is dirt and a little steep. Watch out if it rained. Possibility to spend the night in the parking lot of the station just above.

title: (5400-569) Chaves -
description:
Laundry service.
Open all year from 8:00 to 22:00.
Self service. Easy parking in the area while doing the laundry.
Across the street from the Hospital.

title: (5130) São João da Pesqueira -
description: Magnificent little grassy beach, shaded with a friendly bar. very narrow access for van or small motorhome

title: (5400) Chaves - N103-5
description: Parking at the Ecovia Tamega in Outeiro Seco, quiet at the water's edge

title: (5160) Torre de Moncorvo - Unnamed Road

title: () São Mamede de Ribatua - N212
description: On the banks of the Douro, fairly steep access, for vans only.

title: (5130) Soutelo do Douro -
description: Très bon spot au bord du Douro, nous avons passé une nuit tranquille. Il y a de la place pour plusieurs véhicules. pas de commodités à part 3 tables et barbecue en dur. Route d'accès en lacets et étroite.

title: (5300) Sortes - EM528
description: Parking in a small village easily accessible. At the start of the 14km PR2 loop. Very calm. No services (except garbage cans).

title: (5450) Vila Pouca de Aguiar - 39 N212
description: Drinking water point, access is not easy, not recommended for large vehicles. Located in the picnic area of the sanctuary.

title: (5160) Granja -

title: (5300) Sortes - M1051
description: A spacious parking lot in a quiet village. Quite level.

title: (5400) Chaves - 39 Avenida Trindade
description:
LIDL parking area for motorhome.
3 places

title: (5450-004) Vila Pouca de Aguiar - 9 Avenida General Humberto Delgado
title_short: (5450-004) Vila Pouca de Aguiar - 9 Avenida General Humberto Delgado

title: (5450) Mesão Frio - 22 Rua Doutor Alberto Rodrigues
title_short: (5450) Mesão Frio - 22 Rua Doutor Alberto Rodrigues

title_short: (5450) Mesão Frio - 38 Avenida Doutor Carlos Alberto de Sousa

title_short: (5400-805) Vile Verde da Raia - 1 Rua Central
description: Place in the middle of a city, ideal to spend a night before or after crossing the border. Very calm. The ground depends on where you park but is sloping

title: () Izeda - 13-14 Largo do Toural
description: The pitch is straight and there is enough space for several campers. There is a waste water disposal station and a possibility to fill up with fresh water. The place is in the town center and if you walk down the street in the direction of “Marktplatz”, there is a permanently installed dixi toilet 200m away. I stayed for one night and it was very quiet and pleasant, I highly recommend.

title: (5400) Travancas -
description: A little shady - Nice little spot for eating or resting and swimming opposite - (this water point was later added as a recreation area and a fishing area) - my truck is 7 m - and ideal for the vans

title: (5400) Vila Verde da Raia - N103-5
description: Large esplanade used only for major events, and the rest of the time open to parking. Very slightly sloping. Quiet if you stray a bit from the road.

title: (5400) Curalha - Bairro Reboreda
description: On a paved portion of the road, quiet even if you can hear a bit of cars on the new road. Stop lunch, but could very well do it for the night. Slight slope, no setvices. a shaft to take shade

title: (5150-501) Vila Nova de Foz Côa - Unnamed Road
title_short: (5150-501) Vila Nova de Foz Côa - Unnamed Road
description:
PLEASE READ THE INTRODUCTION BEFORE CLAIMING ABOUT THINGS.

Beautiful and calm place to stay one night. There are public toilets (probably closed), a lot of little uneven shaded places to park, and an astonishing landscape to the Douro river. Near by you can find a fishing spot, a river beach without guard. You can also take a boat trip in "Embarcação Senhora da Veiga" on the other side of the dam just take a look in the website of the city council. I added this place because is in my hometown and I downloaded the photo from google just to show you the view from the chapel. Hope you enjoy it!

title: (5320) - N103
description: Place on the road between vinhais and chaves road very little passing, a little away at the top of a bend. Breathtaking panoramas. Place for several vehicles. Provide holds.

title: (5060) - 5 CM1262
description: Drinking water from source! Very nice. It fills 13l in 30 seconds.

title: (5160) Ferrel - Unnamed Road
description: At the edge of the dam, Little Lake. Quiet, possibility to swim. Easy access road

title: (5070) Cotas - 11 Rua da Gingeira
description:
Leaving the road, to a small trail (easy access) on your right, a water tower surrounded by pine trees. location, quiet, very quiet, well-shaded, no passage.

"respect this place"

title: (5160) Rio Douro - IP2
description: Parking area next to old road/railway bridge. Nice views of the damn too. Bridge is an interesting walk but it says no pedistrians so definitely take care and be careful.

title: (5400) Quinta de Montalvões - EM506
description: Small side street from the main street. Located near the motorway. Quiet night spent except for passing cars. Great for a quick and short night.

title: (5150) Vila Nova de Foz Côa - Unnamed Road
title_short: (5150) Vila Nova de Foz Côa - Unnamed Road
description: A calm and peaceful place on the banks of the Douro, possibility of swimming. Easy access to any vehicle.

title: (5150) Vila Nova de Foz Côa - Unnamed Road
title_short: (5150) Vila Nova de Foz Côa - Unnamed Road
description: Large paved parking lot next to a jetty on the Douro River. Quiet place to rest and spend the night. Without services.

title: (5150) Vila Nova de Foz Côa - 10 IP2
title_short: (5150) Vila Nova de Foz Côa - 10 IP2
description: Flat tarmac car park adjacent to the hydro baragem of the Douro river.

title: (5300) - N206
description: On unpaved forest road at a crossroads. Surrounded by low forest in all directions. Okay for one night if you do not want to sleep in the city of Braganza.

name: ALVAO VILLAGE CAMPING
title: (5450) ALVAO VILLAGE CAMPING
description: Nice campsite with good toilets, good swimming pool. Very clean. Ideal for families with children as it has a swimming pool and children's play area.

title: (5450) - A7
description: Local for rest and possible sleeping overnight next to highway.

title: (5425-011) Anelhe -
description: Relaxed place to stand. No facilities. But very peaceful

title: (5060) Delgada - Rua de São Brás
description: Beekeeping farm with views of the Douro Region and the Douro Valley. We are in a very small and quiet village, off the route of the mass tourism of the Douro. We offer the possibility of spending the night for free on our farm next to our centenary chestnut trees. Water point and shadows. We accept pets and you can have barbecues. Possibility of visiting the apiary and dressing up as a beekeeper. Phone number available for PRO subscribers.

title: (5450) Soutelo de Aguiar - EM555
description: Big parking in front of a little parque by a lake with piquenique tables under trees and a little cafe by the side. We loved it for a lunchbreak close to the autostrada. Portuguese families bring their grandma's here for a walk around the lake and a piquenique.

title: (5150) Vila Nova de Foz Côa - N324
title_short: (5150) Vila Nova de Foz Côa - N324
description: Fill well with grid for canister without thread

title: (5130) Quinta Do Grichão Viseu -
description: Small BBQ area with space for up to 4 Van's. water for dishwashing. good nice views, had a good night.

title: (5320) Vinhais -
description: Nice place behind the church. Overlooking the town. Quiet place, at least today :)

name: Viewpoint of Sao Salvador do Mundo
title: () Viewpoint of Sao Salvador do Mundo
title_short: () Viewpoint of Sao Salvador do Mundo
description: Nice quiet place with a really beautiful view of the river about 600 meters below. The view is great.

title: (5320) Vinhais -
description: This is the completely level place where the bus station is and where you can spend the night without any problem.

title: (5130) São João da Pesqueira - Largo das Covinhas
title_short: (5130) São João da Pesqueira - Largo das Covinhas
description: Large car park at Mirador de Sao salvador do Mundo. We stayed the night. Little traffic. A beautiful view at the top of the watchtower.

title: () Vinhais - N103
description: Sloping place, you'll need holds. Very calm and beautiful point of view

title: (5130) Miradouro De Vargelas - EM541
description: Beautiful paragraph to take advantage of the beautiful landscapes of the Douro and its Quintas. Very calm and with tables for PickNick.

title: (5130) Vale de Figueira - N222-3
description: Space at the edge of an arm of the Douro. Possibility of spending the night with a van. Provide calles to be horizontal and do not interfere with the passage. Several large picnic shale tables available. Some water activities not annoying and fishing.

title: (5200) Mogadouro - Unnamed Road
description: Small Picnic area with great panoramic view, at the side of the road with water fountain, picnic table and barbecue.

title: (5060) Sabrosa -
description: Quiet parking in the middle of nature for 2 vans next to a small building (water reserve style) without any service (except 4G). Completely passable dirt path for a van. Please leave the place clean and bring your trash.

title: (5000) São Tomé do Castelo - 2191 R Principal
title_short: (5000) São Tomé do Castelo - 2191 R Principal
description: Parking day parking next to a grocery bar and a cemetery! ideal for visiting the very quiet and pleasant village

title: (32697) Verín - 97 N-532
description: Picnic tables in the shade at the edge of the road. a lot of ground rubbish :-(

name: Parque Campismo de Mogadouro
title: (5200-202) Parque Campismo de Mogadouro
description: Well-kept municipal campsite, clean sanitary facilities, washing machine. In addition to the municipal sports park with swimming pool, guests can collect free cards at the reception. Very friendly and helpful managers. Baker arrives at camp around 9 am with freshly baked rolls.

title: (5130-340) São João da Pesqueira - Rua do Pombal
title_short: (5130-340) São João da Pesqueira - Rua do Pombal
description: Free flat P in front of secundary school, with extended panorama over small village and mountains around Douro valley. Beautiful sun rising. Busy during lessons timetable but free evenings and nights and whole weekend. Read on Largo da Devesa about what to visit.

title: (5300) Nogueira - N206
description: Large unpaved car park on a street with little traffic. Magnificent panoramic view!

title: (5130) São João da Pesqueira - Largo das Devesas
title_short: (5130) São João da Pesqueira - Largo das Devesas
description: Free in-line P in quiet garden place with picnic tables, playground and big trees shade, ideal for eating and visit historic center of this village (do not miss tiles panels inside townhall (= Câmara Municipal) and wine museum (= Museu do Vinho) in new very interesting wooden building. This small town is biggest county producing Douro wine.

name: Parque de Campismo Mata do Cabo
title: (5130-321) Parque de Campismo Mata do Cabo
title_short: (5130-321) Parque de Campismo Mata do Cabo
description: Parque de Campismo Mata do Cabo This camping area is connected to the local public sports center. Besides very nice pitches for tents, it has six flat stone pitches for campers with electricity and water. Toilets and showers are shared with the sports center. During the season the large public swimming pool is complementary. Very friendly staff. During the off-season, it was very quiet. A few steps from the historic center and the tile panels inside the town hall (= Câmara Municipal) and the wine museum (= Museu do Vinho) in a modern and interesting wooden building (this county is the largest producer of Douro wine).

title: (5300) Castro de Avelãs -
description: Quiet parking area for the night along a small road, very little traffic.

title: (5130) São João da Pesqueira - 169 Avenida Dessarges
title_short: (5130) São João da Pesqueira - 169 Avenida Dessarges
description: Service point ONLY for wastewater (grey water), once blackwater (toilet) is locked and freshwater not available. Just aside N 222 road. Supermarket aside.

title: (5060) Celeirós - N323
description: Parking in front of quinta do Portal

title: (5130) São João da Pesqueira -
description: Small pine forest behind a chapel. Portuguese layout: tables, benches, BBQ, garbage cans. Very calm place. Arrival at La Chapelle, take the tour to get there.

name: Quinta Dos Espinheiros - Casa de Turismo
title: () Quinta Dos Espinheiros - Casa de Turismo
title_short: () Quinta Dos Espinheiros - Casa de Turismo
description: Quinta dos espinheiros. AMAZING! If you want to taste some authentic port, wine and delicious olive oil this is the place! Experience the real Portuguese hospitality, find a spot for the night on this cute property with amazing views! We stayed for free with free electricity and tons of smiles! Anna speaks a great english, french and espagnole! She knows all about the region and her wines. We stumbled upon this place (with a caravane sign) and sooo glad we went for it! Truly recommend it! don’t hesitate to help this local business and buy their product they are delicious!

title: (5060) Provesende - N323
description:
Nice picnic area on the Pinhao road after the bridge, towards Sabrosa. a shadow
 welcome, picnic tables and a refreshing breeze. we only picnicked there, but nothing prevents us from spending a discreet night there.

title: (5060-451) São Martinho de Anta -
description: Vantage point at a chapel surrounded by nature, with stone benches and tables, on a side street but very quiet, level pitches, good for spending the night

title: (5060) São Martinho de Anta -
description: Beautiful area with a view of the entire surrounding area, area equipped with stone table benches

title: (5085-010) Casal de Loivos - R. da Fonte Santa
title_short: (5085-010) Casal de Loivos - R. da Fonte Santa
description: Small car park with a very nice view of the Pinhao valley. The location is quiet.

title: (5300) Nogueira - Unnamed Road
description: Car park of the Sanctuario de nossa Senhora da cabeca chapel. 360 view. Large flat gravel and grass parking lot. Very rare passages

title: (5130) - N222
description: Viewpoint over the valley, along the road, with picnic table.

name: Biospot do Parque Biológico de Vinhais-Sede
title: (5320) Biospot do Parque Biológico de Vinhais-Sede
title_short: (5320) Biospot do Parque Biológico de Vinhais-Sede
description: Biological Park of Vinhais. Payment possible by credit card. Gray water drain. Drain black waters. Reloading in water. Shower. Toilet. Electricity. Washing done by the staff (ask the reception). Activities: Playground for children, Swimming (natural swimming pool), hiking (starting from two paths), tree climbing, zipline, climbing, visit of the park, paintball.

title: (5150) Vila Nova de Foz Côa -
description: Miradouro da estrada da costa

title: (5060-263) Provesende - 5 Viela das Pereiras
description: Small parking lot overlooking a beautiful valley. Toilets open. Amazing bar/museum next door, little cafe, little shop. We stayed for a quick stop but sure it would be OK to stay if you support the village amenities.

title: (5155) - Rua das Flores
description: Ground parking allowing access to the ruin of the castle which is very nice to visit (in addition free access). The panorama is superb and could have spent the night there without problem. We also recommend the small town bar with a great welcome. Attention, difficult access road for large vehicle because the alleys of the city are narrow.

title: (5085) S. Cristovao - Miradouro Escritor Miguel Torga
title_short: (5085) S. Cristovao - Miradouro Escritor Miguel Torga
description: On the road between Pinhao and Sabrosa, many belvedere with enough clearance to park (more or less flat depending on the location). We were not disturbed at night and were able to enjoy the sunrise over the vines and the Douro. Gorgeous!

title: (5300) Nogueira - 5 EM519
description: Point of view on a dam. little known place and therefore you will not be bored. surrounded by nature, view on the lake, and 15min from the center of braganza :) I did not sleep there but it is doable without worry, pick up your waste please !!!

title: (5320) Vinhais - N103
description: Stop on the right tarmac car park (possible to sleep there) and the stream to cool off.

title: (5060) - 10 Rua Miguel Torga
description: Free park with lots of space

title: () Vila Nova de Foz Côa - 1 Largo São Sebastião
title_short: () Vila Nova de Foz Côa - 1 Largo São Sebastião
description: Quiet and clean area.

title: (5085) Pinhão - Unnamed Road
description: Small place ideal for eating next to the douro

title: (5085) Pinhão - 6 Rua Ponte do Pinhão
description: Parking along the long arm of the douro. Buses and trucks.

title: (5085-037) Pinhão - 23A Rua António Manuel Saraiva
description: Drinking fountain, in front of the station

title: (5320) - Unnamed Road
description: Site by the lake in a nature park. Nice terrain!

title: (5130) - Unnamed Road
description: The most beautiful place to park either during the day or overnight. Just off the N222 route in Portugal, this park up offers the most stunning vistas that Portugal has to offer. Rolling hills reaching out over 15km - the Douro river spread symetrically across the landscape, with small fishing vessels and the occasional cruise boat hum along across the scene. And to top it off a train line follows the river In the distance, before making its way into the small Portuguese villiage. Oh and this is Vine yard territory, so contouring galore! If you’re on the long drive to Porto via the N222 (voted Avis’ best driving road) stop and stay the night. Next levs lush!

title: (5300) Castrelos - 44 Bairro do Eiro
description: Water tap here, don't know if it's drinking water.

title: (5085-042) Pinhão - 18 Rua António Manuel Saraiva
description: Toilets and showers. To sleep, prefer the spot in front of the restaurants

title: (5085) Pinhão - EM590
description: Faced with the Douro. Boat trips possible. Magnificent view. Very difficult to access for big jigs (steep and paved street, hairpin bend)

title: (5130) São João da Pesqueira - Unnamed Road
title_short: (5130) São João da Pesqueira - Unnamed Road
description:
A nice spot located next to a vineyard under a pine tree with a beautiful view.
easy access and can probably fit 2 campervans.
*update: lots of flying bugs during the night

title: (5085) Pinhão - EM590
description: Parking nice and official frame for campers, noisy
